vcsa_monitor.system package¶

Submodules¶

vcsa_monitor.system.uptime module¶

vcsa_monitor.system.uptime.get_uptime(vcsa, token, log, debug)[source]¶

Get VCSA uptime

Parameters:
  • vcsa (str) – name of a specific vCenter (fqdn)
  • token (str) – session id
  • log (bool) – enable log to file
  • debug (bool) – enable debug
Returns:

days of system uptime
Return type:

time, float
